TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnHeader extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ICloneable

type ColumnHeader = class inherit Component interface ICloneable

summary.span: 在 控制項中顯示單一資料行行首。

span.span: Displays a single column header in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行標頭是中的項目控制項，其中包含標題文字。A column header is an item in a control that contains heading text. 可以將物件加入至使用方法類別。 objects can be added to a using the method of the class. 若要加入群組的資料行，您可以使用方法類別。To add a group of columns to a , you can use the method of the class. 您可以使用的屬性類別，以決定在何處位於。You can use the property of the class to determine where the is located in the . 提供和屬性來設定顯示在控制項和資料行標頭文字的對齊方式的文字。 provides the and properties to set the text displayed in the control and the alignment of the text in the column header. 若要判斷是否相關聯控制項，您可以參考屬性。To determine whether a is associated with a control, you can reference the property. 如果您想要複製用在另一個控制項，您可以使用方法。If you want to copy a for use in another control, you can use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 此範例會建立物件，並設定資料行行首，和屬性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 範例也會加入項目，並以子項。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要在表單和呼叫中執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼`PopulateListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法才有效一次且包含已建構，而且資料行填入項目。Calling the method is only effective once the and containing have been constructed, and the column is populated with items. 如果將新的項目新增至，除非資料行就不會重新調整大小會再次呼叫。If new items are added to the , the column will not resize unless is called again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓它所佔用的記憶體可以回收記憶體回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則，資源會使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫物件的解構函式。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在 中影像的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed in the .

value.span: 顯示在 中影像的索引。

span.span: The index of the image displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考所指定之影像的索引屬性包含。The property refers to the index of an image specified by the property of the that contains the . 屬性會傳回-1，如果沒有任何nastaven 包含。The property returns -1 if there is no set on the containing . 資料行中所顯示的影像通常用來表示資料行中的項目狀態。The image displayed in a column is typically used to indicate the state of items in the column. 和互斥，這表示如果有設定，其他是設為無效的值並忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 與相關聯的映像通常用來表示的狀態資訊。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information. 如果您設定大於在相關聯的映像清單中，最後一個項目的索引值將會設定為影像清單中的最後一個項目的索引。If you set the to a value greater than the index of the last item in the associated image list, will be set to the index of the last item in the image list.

span.span: is less than -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ImageKey : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在資料行中影像的索引鍵。

span.span: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the column.

value.span: 顯示在資料行中影像的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the image displayed in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和是互斥的屬性，這表示如果有一個設定，其他設定為無效的值並忽略。The and properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果設為無效的值，將不會顯示映像，並不會擲回例外狀況。If is set to an invalid value, an image will not be displayed, and an exception will not be thrown. 與相關聯的映像通常用來表示的狀態資訊。The image associated with a is typically used to indicate the state information.

summary.span: 取得這個資料行在 控制項之 中的位置。

span.span: Gets the location with the control's of this column.

span.span: The zero-based index of the column header within the of the control it is contained in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值不一定對應到內的資料行行首的目前可見位置。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the column header within the . 這可能是因為使用者在執行階段時重新排列資料行標頭 (當屬性設定為`true`)。This can be due to the user reordering the column headers at run time (when the property is set to `true`). 如果未包含在控制這個屬性會傳回-1 值。If the is not contained within a control this property returns a value of -1.

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於 中文字的水平對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the text displayed in the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來提供不同的文字中每個顯示的文字對齊設定。You can use this property to provide different text alignment settings for the text displayed in each . > [!NOTE] > 由於基礎控制項中的限制，此屬性具有任何作用中的第一個資料行上控制項，永遠靠左對齊。Due to a limitation in the underlying control, this property has no effect on the first column in the control, which is always aligned to the left. 若要解決此限制[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，您可以處理事件並自行繪製資料行行首。To work around this limitation in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can handle the event and paint the column header yourself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 此範例會建立物件，並設定資料行行首，和屬性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 範例也會加入項目，並以子項。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要在表單和呼叫中執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼`PopulateListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料行的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the column.

value.span: 以像素為單位之資料行的寬度。

span.span: The width of the column, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您設定的。This property enables you to set the of the . 可以調整資料行的內容或標題的執行階段設定。The can be set to adjust at run time to the column contents or heading. 若要調整資料行中最長的項目寬度，請設定屬性為-1。To adjust the width of the longest item in the column, set the property to -1. 資料行標題的寬度自動調整大小，設定-2 的屬性。To autosize to the width of the column heading, set the property to -2. > [!NOTE] > 當所有資料行的結合的寬度超過 32,768 個像素時，可能會造成非預期的行為。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化控制項。The following code example demonstrates initializing a control. 此範例會建立物件，並設定資料行行首，和屬性。The example creates objects and sets the column header's , and properties. 範例也會加入項目，並以子項。The example also adds items and subitems to the . 若要在表單和呼叫中執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼`PopulateListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example paste the following code in a form and call the `PopulateListView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAndPictureBox/VB/form1.vb#1)]
